H0.text: Who was the only judge on 'X Factor' to return for series eight in 2011. Simon Cowell

H1.text: Who was the only judge on 'X Factor' to return for series eight in 2011. Cheryl Cole

H2.text: Who was the only judge on 'X Factor' to return for series eight in 2011. Dannii Minogue

H3.text: Who was the only judge on 'X Factor' to return for series eight in 2011. LOUIS WALSH

A4.text: Cowell was replaced by Gary Barlow

A5.text: In 2011, UK series eight winners Little Mix signed to Cowell's label

A6.text: Louis Walsh returned to the judging panel for series eight.

A7.text: Dannii Minogue left due to a clash with Australia's Got Talent.
